bug.summary: UI makes it impossible to edit 1-line markdown cells without resizing
bug.description:
Problem related to the reports' UI. <denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
How to reproduce:
Create a report Add a markdown cell Resize it to be 1 line tall Try to edit the text
Expected behaviour: clicking the cell should open the editor and allow the user to type on the cell Observed behaviour: when hovering on the cell the clickable text appears ("") making it impossible to click on the cell and edit the content. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23483071/87426704-e777fa00-c5df-11ea-8847-c599b08af6f2.png></denchmark-link>
